author: Alejandro Santiago
title: 4 Fantastic Portrait Tutorials: Tips & Tricks for Better Photos
text:
4. The Secrets To Shooting And Processing Natural Light Portraits by Jessica Drossin 
Jessica Drossin shares her tips for using post-processing to bring your natural light portraits to life. Learn the subtleties of balancing light and shadows from start to finsih. 
Do you have any portrait tips of your own? Share them in the comments belowâ€”or even better, share your favorite portrait and we may share it on social media. Related
